required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Focus Group in Collecting Feedbacks From Indoor Tanning Bed Users for Social Media-Delivered Intervention Development

lead_sponsor.agency: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey

clinical_study.source: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey

brief_summary.textblock: This research trial collects feedbacks from indoor tanning bed users via focus group for the development of social media-delivered intervention. Conducting a focus group with people using indoor tanning bed and having access to Facebook may help doctors to better understand people's perspective and thoughts about the various Facebook messages.

detailed_description.textblock:
PRIMARY OBJECTIVES:
I. To elicit feedback from young adult women who use indoor tanning beds on preliminary intervention content.
OUTLINE:
Participants attend a focus group session and review printed copies of planned posts for the to-be-developed Facebook intervention over 90 minutes to 2 hours.

primary_outcome.description: Focus group questions will elicit descriptions of general interest. Participants will also rate various posts on the hand-out sheets included in the script.

Focus group questions will elicit descriptions of posts, and as well as suggestions for improving existing posts or creating new ones. Participants will also rate various posts on the hand-out sheets included in the script.
Focus group questions will elicit descriptions of general interest of topics. Participants will also rate various posts on the hand-out sheets included in the script.

arm_group.description: Participants attend a focus group session and review printed copies of planned posts for the to-be-developed Facebook intervention over 90 minutes to 2 hours.

study_pop.textblock: Facebook users use of an indoor tanning bed at least 10 times in the past 12 months

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Use of an indoor tanning bed at least 10 times in the past 12 months
- At least daily use of Facebook

overall_official.affiliation: Rutgers Cancer Institute of New Jersey

facility.name: Rutgers Cancer Institute of New Jersey

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Rutgers Cancer Institute of New Jersey
responsible_party.investigator_title: Professor and Associate Director of Population Science
